content.rendered:
SMART CAP TABLES

Cap Tables That
Manage Themselves

Because founders have more important things to worry about
than updating spreadsheets

Go From Messy Spreadsheets
To Smart Cap Tables

Before Altshare

You’ve got a startup to run. But then comes time to manage equity, and it’s nothing but distractions... all while you’re scaling like crazy. This can’t possibly work long-term.

After Altshare

Now your equity practically manages itself. Goodbye spreadsheets and paperwork. Hello more time for literally anything else.

request a demo

Faster, Easier, Smarter Equity

Equity, Without the Complexity

Track and manage all company ownership in a single, smart cap table, that’s always up-to-date. Roll out vesting schedules in just a few clicks. Issue new options without having to manually adjust anything. And visualize it all with ready-to-read charts and graphs.

Equity, Without the Complexity

Track and manage all company ownership in a single, smart cap table, that’s always up-to-date. Roll out vesting schedules in just a few clicks. Issue new options without having to manually adjust anything. And visualize it all with ready-to-read charts and graphs.

Keep Everyone On the Same Page

Share anything equity with anyone who needs it, while controlling exactly who sees what. From
key contacts, to investors and lawyers -- now
everyone gets the info they need and
collaborates freely.

Keep Everyone On the Same Page

Share anything equity with anyone who needs it, while controlling exactly who sees what. From
key contacts, to investors and lawyers -- now
everyone gets the info they need and
collaborates freely.

Workflows
That Flow

Turn even the most complicated processes into smart, automated workflows. And with every step mapped out perfectly, you take out any room for human error and make everything run faster than ever.

Workflows That Flow

Turn even the most complicated processes into smart, automated workflows. And with every step mapped out perfectly, you take out any room for human error and make everything run faster than ever.

Put Everything
on the Table

Get your cap table right today, so you’re ready to grow tomorrow. With all your equity organized in Altshare, you breeze through complex waterfall analyses, scenario modelling and 409A
valuations -- because you’ll have to do all this sooner than you think.

Put Everything on the Table

Get your cap table right today, so you’re ready to grow tomorrow. With all your equity organized in Altshare, you breeze through complex waterfall analyses, scenario modelling and 409A
valuations -- because you’ll have to do all this sooner than you think.

Founders Taking Ownership
of Cap Tables

Inbal Myers
Director of Finance, Rapyd

“Instead of complex and expensive manual term sheet analysis, AltShare’s solution does it all automatically - cap table management, waterfall analysis, modeling…and more!”
Leeron Aran
VP Finance, Guesty

“AltShare’s 409A Valuation Solution is a game-changer for us. The fact that we can produce work paper-ready, defensible 409A valuations in less than an hour – and without hiring a consultant – is changing the way we handle our valuations.”
Roei Khermosh
CFO, Papaya Global

“AltShare helps me access my portfolio with a user friendly interface. I would suggest this product to any company that want's to offer stocks to their employees.”
Stephanie Pardo
CFO , Shift Technology

“Easy to navigate the equity management and platform which include a dashboard view and menu with features like updated cap table, ESOP Management, 409A valuations and more.”
Jonathan Eldan
VP Finance, LawGeex

“I like how this software generate all required reports, analyses and is user friendly. Very easy to run waterfall scenarios based on the company's cap table and also very easy to understand the graphs that are generated.”
Eli Kalman
VP Finance, WSC Sports Technologies

“Analytical tools are great. The software is also very flexible and allows for individual customization of many items.”
Tal Brener
CFO, Natural Intelligence

“AltShare is extremely friendly and flexible and helps me manage the employee’s equity in an easy efficient way, it saves overheads, improves accuracy and serve the variety of the corporate needs.”
Eyal Toledano
Co-Founder & CTO, Zebra Medical

“Altshare is a must have for any company looking to streamline the complex equity management process. Not only does it save us a ton of time, but it also provides our employees & shareholders a level of transparency that is unmatched.”
request a demo
No data was found

Get Your
Equity Done

request a demo
